column2: ReneSola Ltd. engages in the manufacture of solar wafers and modules. The company is headquartered in Shanghai, Shanghai and currently employs 222 full-time employees. The firm is a brand and technology provider of energy-efficient products based in China. The firm operates Solar Power Project segment. The Solar Power Project segment is engaged in the solar power project development and electricity generation, as well as the provision of Engineering, Procurement and Construction (EPC) services. The firm's solar power projects pipeline includes early to mid-stage projects pipeline and late stage projects pipeline. The firm mainly conducts its businesses in China, United States, Bulgaria, Romania, England, Turkey, France and Japan.
